org.ss12.wordprediction.model
Interface PredictionModel

public interface PredictionModel

Returns suggestions from a dictionary and from what the user inputs.

Method Summary

getSuggestionsFromDic

java.lang.String[] getSuggestionsFromDic(java.lang.String begin_seq,
                                         int numOfSuggestions)
Gets an array of suggestions of length numOfSuggestions based on the dictionary.

Parameters:
begin_seq - starting sequence for suggestions
numOfSuggestions - number of suggestions to return
Returns:
the suggestions

getSuggestionsGramBased

java.lang.String[] getSuggestionsGramBased(java.lang.String[] context,
                                           int numOfSuggestions)
Gets an array of suggestions of length numOfSuggestions based on the user's inputs. If context is length 1, then this method returns completions of the provided string. If context is greater than 1, this method returns completions of the last string in the array, where previous elements in the array are the preceding words.

Parameters:
context - the starting sequence for suggestions, and possible preceding words
numOfSuggestions - number of suggestions to return
Returns:
the suggestions

cleanup

void cleanup()
Saves the internal data to disk.
